text:
It's not just they died from #COVID19. It's their loss of 11 years of life. And more life lost in the US.
https://t.co/DpkRaOtG64
The median covid-19 sufferer in America is a 48; in Italy it is 63.
"shortened the lives of American victims by 11 years, on average" @TheEconomist
